level.heading: Court costs and attorney's fees.
level.text: The court shall award costs and reasonable attorney's fees to a resident who prevails in an action brought under § 7-705.01 or § 7-705.02.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-218
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-218, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-701.01.
